title: Calories in 1 Tsp Sugar
meta_description: Discover calories in 1 tsp sugar, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition breakdown per teaspoon, with tweaks and FAQs for better choices.
assumptions: Granulated white sugar; level teaspoon (≈4 g); no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by sugar type, density, and measurement; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 1 tsp sugar provides ~16 kcal, all from carbohydrates.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 tsp of sugar?
faqs.a: About 16 kcal per level teaspoon of granulated sugar.
Yes, 1 tsp sugar is nearly 100% carbohydrates (4 g), all as sugars.

faqs.q: Does sugar have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: No, pure sugar has 0 g protein and 0 g fat.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in 1 tsp?
What's the difference in calories between white and brown sugar?
faqs.a: Negligible—both ≈16 kcal per tsp, though brown has trace molasses.
